statements: SELECT * FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY reservation_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM rental_reservations WHERE pick_up_location = 'Airport';
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location FROM rental_reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location, reservation_date FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location FROM rental_reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND pick_up_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE pick_up_location = 'Los Angeles' OR drop_off_location = 'San Francisco';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date FROM rental_reservations WHERE pick_up_location = 'Miami' ORDER BY reservation_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE pick_up_date > '2022-09-15';
SELECT car_model, rental_rate FROM car_inventory WHERE available_quantity >= 3 AND is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM car_inventory WHERE rental_rate < 100.00 ORDER BY rental_rate DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE pick_up_date BETWEEN '2022-09-15' AND '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT car_model, rental_rate FROM car_inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY rental_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE pick_up_date >= '2022-01-01' AND drop_off_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM car_inventory WHERE is_available = TRUE AND rental_rate <= 100 ORDER BY car_model ASC;

SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location, pick_up_date, drop_off_date FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY pick_up_location, drop_off_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM car_rental_reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM car_rental_reservations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM car_rental_locations;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM car_rental_inventory;
SELECT customer_name, pick_up_location, drop_off_location, reservation_date FROM car_rental_reservations;
SELECT * FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE pick_up_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM car_rental_inventory WHERE availability_status = 'available' ORDER BY vehicle_year DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM car_rental_locations WHERE location_phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM car_rental_reservations INNER JOIN car_rental_inventory ON car_rental_reservations.reservation_id = car_rental_inventory.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, pickup_location, drop_off_location FROM rental_reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM cars WHERE car_color = 'Red';
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Ma%';
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT car_make, car_model, car_year FROM cars WHERE car_color = 'Blue';
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE address IS NULL ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT reservation_id, pickup_location, drop_off_location, reservation_date FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_rental_reservations;
SELECT car_id, pick_up_location, drop_off_location FROM car_rental_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date FROM car_rental_reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM cars WHERE color = 'blue';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT car_id, make, model, year FROM cars WHERE color = 'Red';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, pick_up_location, drop_off_location FROM car_rental_reservations WHERE reservation_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
